attributes.action:
all ballot papers in the UK elections go say 
  “non of these candidates”
attributes.additional_details:
Many people in the United Kingdom don’t vote in   elections because there is no one worth voting for any their opinions.
Haven’t the wording “ none of the candidates” as an option to vote for gives a clear and fair view of what the British public don’t want
attributes.background: Agree to my proposal, so  we the sovereign people have a fairer voice over our lives

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Implement "None of the above" on ballots in all United Kingdom elections #NOTAUK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650023
